query: Use B and C to make A into a flower shape and fold the petals. What will happen when putting it in D?

original_scene.description: A is a piece of white paper. B is a pair of scissors. C is two paintbrushes, one yellow and one red. D is a plate filled with water.

key_step_1.conclusion: Use B and C to make A into a flower shape. A contains a lot of plant fiber.

key_step_2.conclusion: Fold the paper flowers along the petals so that when you put it into D, only the bottom is in contact with D.

key_step_3.conclusion: Put the folded flower into D, and the water will reach the petals through the plant fibers, causing the petals to open.

final_scene.annotation: The flower-shaped A folds its petals and puts them into D. The petals absorb moisture and open up.

subject: mechanics
